file_content.text: Lieutenant, evacuate the base. The mines under it are filled with gas and the Empire is about to ignite it.
Everyone in Aurek Base is in danger, Lieutenant. The Empire is planning to use the Ortolans' mine as a huge bomb.
Havoc Squad to Aurek Base, evacuate immediately. The Empire's about to ignite an explosive gas right under you.
Lieutenant, you'd better get out of there. You're sitting on top of a gas mine, and the Empire's about to blow it up.
I'll send everyone who can hold a blaster to your position. Try to buy us some time!
If this doesn't work, it's going to get very hot very fast over there.
I'll see what I can do.
The base isn't worth all this trouble. Just get out while you can!
This seems like a bad idea.
We have a lot of wounded in kolto tanks. We need more time.
Head into the mines and try to stop them from igniting the gas. We'll prepare for the worst. Good luck.
